night.text: Cloudy with bright spells. At times rain. Fog in places. Southerly wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature 7..12°C.
night.sea:
Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 07:00 UTC Sep 30 to 07:00 UTC Oct 1, 2019.
Weather summary: Low deepening over Sea of Bothnia.
No warnings
Northern Baltic: variable wind 2 to 7, in evening becoming southwest, west 5 to 10 m/s. at night west increasing 12 to 17, in gusts up to 22 m/s. At night wave height 2 to 4 m. Rain at times. Visibility moderate.
Moonsund, Northern Gulf of Riga, Western Gulf of Finland: southerly wind 3 to 9 m/s, in afternoon variable wind 2 to 6 m/s. At night wind becoming west and increasing by morning 11 to 16, in gusts up to 20 m/s. In morning wave height 1.5 to 3 m. Rain at times. Visibility moderate, at night and morning locally fog.
Eastern Gulf of Finland: southerly wind 3 to 9 m/s, at night wind becoming west and in morning increasing 7 to 12, in gusts up to 15 m/s. Rain at times. Visibility moderate.
night.peipsi: Southerly wind 4-8 m/s. Wave height 0.3-0.9 m. At times rain. Visibility moderate. Air temperature 8..10°C.

day.text: Cloudy with bright spells. Rain in many places. Mainly southerly, in afternoon variable wind 2-7 m/s. Air temperature 12..15°C.
day.peipsi: Southerly wind 2-7 m/s. Wave height 0.3-0.7 m. At times rain. Visibility moderate. Air temperature 12..14°C.

night.text: Cloudy with bright spells with rain at times. West, southwest wind increasing 7-12, on coast by morning 10-15, in gusts up to 20 m/s, on islands increasing west, northwest 11-16, in gusts up to 22 m/s. Air temperature 5..8, on cosat to 11°C.

day.text: Partly cloudy. In forenoon scattered showers, in northern part locally sleet possible, in afternoon from south showers will die out. Southwest, west wind 7-13, in gusts 17 m/s, on coast 12-16, in gusts up to 17, on islands and coast 18-22 m/s. Air temperature 8..12°C.

night.text: A fwe or partly cloudy and mainly dry. Southwest, west, at first 7-12, in gusts 15, on northern coast 12-16, in gusts up to 20 m/s, by morning decreasing 3-10, on northern coust in gusts 14 m/s. Air temperature 2..6, on coast 6..11°C.

day.text: Variable cloudy. In forenoon locally, in afternoon in many places shower. Southerly wind 3-9 m/s. Air temperature 10..13°C.

night.text: A few or partly cloudy. On continent local showers, on islands a new are of rain. South, southwest wind 2-7 m/s. Air temperature 1..6, on coast to 10°C.

day.text: Cloudiness is thickening and rain is spreading from islands over mainland to east. On continent south, southwest, on islands northwest wind 1-7 m/s. Air temperature 9..12°C.
